content.rendered: For High-quality printing, Look to the LEONS’ 2 inch Mobile Bluetooth Receipt thermal printer along with Bluetooth V4.0 with Built-in Rechargeable Battery (Black and Blue) online at low price in India. It can be widely applied to take away portable thermal bill printing, Taxi receipt printing, Administrative Fees receipt printing, Restaurant Ordering information printing, Online Payment information Printing, Express logistics Printing,barcode printing etc.

excerpt.rendered:
• 2-inch Paper Width
  • Bluetooth V4.0
  • Range Up To 10 Meters
  • Clear Barcode Printing
  • Fast Printing Speed
  • High Resolution Printing With 203DPI
